text: Lianyungangdong (Lianyungang East) railway station () is a station on Longhai railway in Lianyungang, Jiangsu. ==History== The station was established in 1935 as Zhongyun railway station (). On 11 November 2009, since Lianyun railway station, the former eastern terminus of Longhai railway, stopped passenger services, the station became the eastern terminus for passenger trains on Longhai railway, and was renamed to the current name. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Jiangsu Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1935
title: Lianyungang East railway station
